text: Niall Rowark is a Hong Kong Rugby Union player. He plays for the Hong Kong Football Club and the National Team at the Fly-half position. ==Career== Rowark represented Hong Kong A in 2008 in a test series against Claremont College from USA. He featured in the 2015 Asian Rugby Championship. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Hong Kong international rugby union players Category:Hong Kong rugby union players Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Niall Rowark
